review_data.content: Someone said once it was the best restaurant in Zurich. I do think it is really a lovely place to eat. Good wine, good food and particulary good service and welcome! Wines suggestions are really good. For two people, around chf 180 with wines.

review_data.title: Excellent food, wonderful wine list, attentive service!
